subject: Writing
title: Captain Underpants: Humor Under Fire
description: A fast breakdown of Captain Underpants: Humor Under Fire for builders.

hook.text: The most banned book in America for multiple years was about a superhero in his underwear. Drawn by a kid.

buildup.text: Dav Pilkey's Captain Underpants series uses toilet humor, comic panels, and deliberate misspellings throughout.

discovery.text: Adults challenged it for encouraging 'disrespectful behavior' and being 'unsuited to the age group.'

twist.text: The series has motivated countless reluctant readers to pick up books â€” especially boys who said they hated reading.

climax.text: With over 80 million copies sold, Captain Underpants proves that laughter is a gateway to literacy.

punchline.text: The most banned book in America taught millions of kids to read.

quiz.question: Why was Captain Underpants frequently banned?
options: For toilet humor and encouraging disrespectful behavior
